name: Psyduck

attacks.name: Headache
attacks.text: Your opponent can't play Trainer cards during his or her next turn.

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

flavorText: While lulling its enemies with its vacant look, this wily Pok√©mon will use psychokinetic powers.

strengths: Headache locks opponent out of Trainer cards
50 HP is decent for a Basic
weaknesses: Fury Swipes is coin flip dependent
counters: Pokemon Powers that don't need Trainers

competitiveHistory: Fossil Psyduck's Headache attack was powerful disruption, preventing the opponent from playing any Trainer cards for a turn. This could buy time and disrupt combo setups. Combined with other lock effects, it contributed to control strategies.

rulings.ruling: Headache prevents ALL Trainer cards from being played, including Items, Supporters, and Stadiums.
The effect lasts until the end of your opponent's next turn.
